website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, insulated bottle that holds a decent amount of water and keeps it reasonably cool.
pros: Comes in a lot of styles
Made with 2 bottles and a foil layer for insulation
Cap is easy to use and does not leak
Stylish and popular because they perform well
Fits in water bottle holders on most bikes
cons: Doesn't keep the liquid cold as long as the stainless-steel insulated models

customer_reviews.title: Which is perfect to me since I use these primarily when working ...
customer_reviews.text: This works as it was designed. I mean no, it won't keep your water cold for hours on end, but if you are using it indoors and add ice to the bottle it does last for a little over an hour. Which is perfect to me since I use these primarily when working out at the gym or during spin class. The mouth of the bottle is wide enough to fit ice cubes in it which is another feature I like since my gym doesn't seem to have cold water coming out of any of their fountains. I originally bought two and I'm thinking of getting another one. Love the different colors!
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Tino

customer_reviews.title: The design looks like crumbled foil underneath the plastic
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap looking and not as shown. It has a very heavy plastic over it so you could barely see the design. The design looks like crumbled foil underneath the plastic. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed-did not keep my water cold
customer_reviews.text: The Polar Bottle Insulated Water Bottle did not keep my water cold. I filled it half full with crushed ice and then added cold water. After 3 hours, the ice had completely melted, and the water was not cold. (The temperature outside was in the high 70s.)
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Like this water bottle, kinda hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and look of the bottle for sure. However, it's a little hard to clean all the little crevices inside the bottle. I'm concerned bacteria is sitting in there and I didn't get it all out. But it does keep water cold and it fits into cup holders in my car and at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Don't Believe the Hype
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these bottles for a backpacking trip. They do NOT keep the water any colder than anything else. In fact, they were good for about a couple hours at best case. On the plus side, the opening was the exact size as my water filter. I didn't have to filter into one and transfer the water. I could screw the filter on, pump it a couple of times and have it filled.
customer_reviews.author: By CJs Pirate

customer_reviews.title: Great value and PURPLE!
customer_reviews.text: Like all polar ice bottles they keep it cold and work well for sports. This is probably our 4th bottle per kid. I also don’t mind relaxing them if lost or left behind!
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: never again
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was too big to fit in the bike, so We returned. THE COST OF THE RETURN WAS 50% OF THE TOTAL PRICE!!!!!!! UNACCEPTABLE!!!!!!!! NEVER NEVER AGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my new bike
customer_reviews.text: wish it was insulated & kept cold but it's great for riding & fits perfectly in the water bottle holder
customer_reviews.author: M. Kruft

customer_reviews.title: I really like this except for the fact that the picture or ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this except for the fact that the picture or print or whatever the coloring it was all crinkled on the inside if this makes any sense like looking at its not a flat color picture it looks like someone shoved the picture coloring inside the outer plastic if that make sense. Other than that bottle is nice
customer_reviews.author: David Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: Very good sports bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought two and the kids love them. Light weight, easy to handle and easy for me to clean. You can probably buy something with more insulation, but these are very good for the money. I will probably buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Seacreature

customer_reviews.title: I like this water bottle a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this water bottle a lot. It doesn't spill ever and holds a lot of water but I don't think it does the best job at keeping things cold. It does keep water cold for awhile but I think other water bottles do a better job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love that the mouth piece can be removed and it ...
customer_reviews.text: So far we have used this water bottle twice. My daughter loves the design. It looks a little crinkled inside, not sure if that's how it's supposed to be. I love that the mouth piece can be removed and it doesn't sweat like a lot of water bottles. Overall, I am very pleased with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Insulated?  Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: This is no different from any other lousy water bottle. Taste like plastic and doesn't keep anything cold. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Big Bri

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice bottle, holds 24 oz
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice bottle,holds 24 oz. without being bulky or oversized. The loop is handy...we used it at the beach and the loop fit the arm chair rest to keep it at fingertip reach.Bottle is indented for ease of holding. I would have been nice to have a covering of some kind over the spout....to keep dust and dirt from contact with the spout and even though it said insulated and we fillled it with just ice...the ice melted within about 2 hours, but it was in the 80s those days we were at the beach. It is nice and will use it at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to dislike!
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike yet. I was worried about it spilling but so far so good. Also the water is kept cooler as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: jogger8

customer_reviews.title: possibly best water bottle ever.
customer_reviews.text: So happy I tried this water bottle. My girls were blowing through bottles, they would dent or crack and it was costing a small fortune. This is tolerating daily use from school and practices. Neither have complained that the water "tastes funny" and i love love love that it is made in the usa.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lemley

customer_reviews.title: These are the best water bottles
customer_reviews.text: These are the best water bottles. I can't say enough great things about them. They DO NOT SWEAT. That's the important part. My daughter had 4 of these last year in the 1st grade. I wash them in the dishwasher and they have held up so well that she'll be using them again this year. I did have to buy Inchbug rubber labels for them because permanent marker doesn't stick but the Inchbug labels fit well. If you're looking for something heavily insulated these are not for you but if you just need something your kid won't tear up and you don't have to hand wash they're worth every nickel.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M.

customer_reviews.title: I put them in the dishwasher & they come out just fine. I just love these bottles
customer_reviews.text: I bike and then also use these bottles for whenever I'm doing outside projects on my house. I put them in the dishwasher & they come out just fine. I just love these bottles!
customer_reviews.author: Funny Honey

customer_reviews.title: Great insulation and best price
customer_reviews.text: Best insulated bottle on the market...many choices of colors to combine with your bike or uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Know exactly what size you need
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the 24onces for my road bike, they are a little to big, but I can still handle to taken out while riding. Love them
customer_reviews.author: regine m.

customer_reviews.title: Its small.
customer_reviews.text: It's small. About half the size I was expecting. Might be good for a small child, but not big enough to hold enough water to get my 11 year old through basketball practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Her favorite color. She thinks it's bigger than mine because it's taller but both are the same ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Solid Water Bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this bottle for softball. It does a pretty good job keeping things cold. Very durable. Has lasted longer than expected. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Droopy

customer_reviews.title: GReat Water Bottles
customer_reviews.text: I love these Bottles. And the price is way better than you will find in stores. Just the right size for a spin class or wight lifting session. And they are BPA free if that matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Freker

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is safe. I bought it for my granddaughter for three week camp. It was narrow enough to fit on the bike. Fluid capacity is large enough for long bike ride. And of course it is attractive looking.
customer_reviews.author: ARUNA TAILOR

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle.
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these bottles. Really like them. Like that they send replacement lids just for shipping charges.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ondray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these water bottles. They hold up really well and they are easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie O.

customer_reviews.title: Good bottle
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great for me thus far. Ice washed them in the dishwasher several times with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Received and happy with purchase. Looks as pictured. I like that it's not a clear bottle like most of the water bottles and is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Moex

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and the size
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the size. Insulation doesn't do anything. I fill it to the top with ice cubes, then water. After 20-30 minutes, the ice is completely melted.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I guess you really do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. This water bottle does not keep the water cold and it makes the water taste funny (like plastic).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bottle for my wife, matching her bike's accent color.
customer_reviews.author: Inspireme

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look or keep cold as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product doesn't look at all like the picture. It looks metal in the picture. It also doesn't keep drinks cold, ice melts right away. Unfortunately i ordered 3
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my water cool during the duration of the bike ride.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great waterbottle, def keeps water or any other beverage ...
customer_reviews.text: Great waterbottle, def keeps water or any other beverage cold, and keeps it cold for awhile! Kinda pricey for water bottle but, its pretty legit.
customer_reviews.author: John Wick

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Just received my bottle and it is extremely poorly made and on a test fill, it leaked. I will return it.....
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Baker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't keep the ice in my bottle as long as I'd expected
customer_reviews.author: sken

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep anything cold, Leaks when tossed in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep anything cold, Leaks when tossed in my bag if it goes sideways. Cute design but now it's moldy on the bottom and very hard to clean. :P Sticking with my Camelbak Big Chill.
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Jefferys

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not cute. I bought this for my pre-teen and it looks cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: Really like this water bottle. Works nicely if you fill halfway, freeze and adds water on top. Water stayed cold even after sitting the car on a summer day for over an hour.
customer_reviews.author: LMM

customer_reviews.title: Nice water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Has a handy strap and is very nice. Kinda looks like foil I side plastic but looks cool. Work very well.
customer_reviews.author: socal

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sweats a lot...doesnt keep things as cold as a camelback for sure
customer_reviews.author: C. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquids cold on hotter days
customer_reviews.text: Keeps liquids relatively cold on hotter days and won’t slip out of your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bowe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best bottle I ever bought for my campers and one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: John Blaze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Polar Bottle! The best water bottles ever!
customer_reviews.author: sweetlilmamaof3

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this water bottle. Not only is it pretty, it performs well too. We fill it with ice first then a drink and it stays cold for a 3 hour practice in all weather. The only thing I don't like is cleaning it. I don't have a brush that can get into the little crevices at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Olson

customer_reviews.title: I love this water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle; great for active kids and people. I love to take this to work, the gym.. great. Keep my water cool. :D
customer_reviews.author: Gissela S. Moyer

customer_reviews.title: great for water only
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, great idea. But a cleaning is a little hard
customer_reviews.author: Asiannerd432

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the price. I bike daily in the South FL heat, and the ice lasts about 45 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: these keep your water cool. Even when it's 90* outside
customer_reviews.text: If you cycle for long periods... these keep your water cool. Even when it's 90* outside, I had cool water 2 hours in.
customer_reviews.author: TheRo0sTer

customer_reviews.title: Great water bottle
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this water bottle, because she swore her water stayed cold longer. She was right! Water does stay cold longer than my other water bottles. Makes long bike rides more comfortable. Best part is, I got mine for a great price!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Christel Scholtz

customer_reviews.title: The liquid shoots out when the spout is pulled up ...
customer_reviews.text: The liquid shoots out when the spout is pulled up. This is a major problem when using on bowling lanes even when riding you're bike.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for school!
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids love these bottles. They take them to school everyday. The bottles keep water cold. Very cool design. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Pobble

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my daughter who swears by these ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who swears by these bottle to keep her drinks cold. She only likes cold water.
customer_reviews.author: L. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps water colder for longer. Narrow shape makes it loose in my bike water bottle holder.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle. Perfect size. Holds a lot. Like that I can freeze it.
customer_reviews.author: roux

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: only kept cold for about 1 hour filled with ice and water.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and keeps everything COLD. Bought it for my little girl
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's fine. It feels like it's scratching my lips though when I'm drinking. Might just be my bottle.
customer_reviews.author: LGL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bottle. Keeps water cold for hours in extremely hot weather
customer_reviews.author: tori

customer_reviews.title: I followed the recommend filling with my water about a quarter of the ...
customer_reviews.text: My bottle was the one I ordered but darker in person. I washed and allowed it to dry with no odor. I followed the recommend filling with my water about a quarter of the way and laying it flat in my freezer. After frozen I added the remaining water. Then I took if with me on my walk. In 93 degree weather. I walked 4 miles. The ice had begun to melt. The water was cold and refreshing. This a light weight water bottle not a double walled water bottle. In all I really enjoy mine. Its portable, has a spout for sipping, and a band for ease of use. Fantastic price! Would buy again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Patten Boyles

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, I've dropped it a couple times and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, I've dropped it a couple times and it hasn't broken. Also keeps the temperature for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: pattern isnt actually outside of the cup
customer_reviews.text: The pattern is actually crinkled up foil-type material between the two layers of the cup. It is still cute, but not the quality I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep water as cold as a Swell Water Bottle
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: The water bottle is great and with ice will last cold for hours
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle is great and with ice will last cold for hours.The ne downside is that it actually doesn't look like the image shown it isn't as shiny and the back round color is darker.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Collins

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The design was on an insert & looks like a plastic bag was shoved into a clear bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: I love this water bottle. I bought 2 and use them for cycling and have been impresses with how long they keep my sports drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: jalder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my track daughter. Fun color and we don't get confused with the other kids bottles!
customer_reviews.author: mdwin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, keeps water cold for several hours, but not all day. Perfect for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Simmons

customer_reviews.title: They play many sports and these are great cups.
customer_reviews.text: This cup is prefect for the kids to take for sports. They play many sports and these are great cups.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bottle. It's my second one so I can have a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It does (YES)produce mold and stains and bad odor will not get off!- the smell is permanent and despite we tried very aggressive and strong chemicals trying to clean it, the stubborn smell and mold keep coming back. Do not buy this, might compromise your health!
customer_reviews.author: TUZO

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle does not keep your water cold for very long. The foil lined interior I feel does nothing. My water is warm by the end of the day and that is after freezing half the bottle the night before. The bottle construction is good though. It has held up so far to drops and the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a young teen to have during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Weekley

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of it and the volume is enough ...
customer_reviews.text: This bottle fits well in my bike's bottle cage. I like the size of it and the volume is enough to get me through a whole bike ride of almost 15 miles. The design is cute and I like how it looks muted due to the outer plastic layer. The plastic loop for carrying is a nice addition and makes it easy to carry this bottle around during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Mari Lehtimaki

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Perfect for school and sports.
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old triplets love these. This is my go to thermos for school and sports. I fill it half full the night before, stick it in the freezer overnight and then fill the rest of the bottle right before school. They say their drinks are still cold by 3 o'clock. We have 4 of these.
customer_reviews.author: absmobley

customer_reviews.title: Awfully made
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest looking and crappiest made water bottle I have ever seen. The dollar store makes better water bottles than this. It looks nothing like the picture. The lining was all wrinkled, looked liked it was shoved in there. I am returning this like immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I bought four of these Polar Bottles in different colors. The colors are cheerful and bright, The bottles are lightweight and great for hiking! The water stays relatively cool, and I haven't noticed any plastic smell as some plastic bottles have.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Too large for my 24" bicycle but love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Too large for my 24" bicycle but love the colors. Too large for lower bar and way too large for handle bar. Will keep and figure out something so I can use on my bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Sailors2

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bottle is thick. Hard to squeeze it with one hand to get water pressure while riding.
customer_reviews.author: radhe

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: Most expensive water bottle ever. Don't waste your money. It does not keep anything colder longer than other water bottles I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Polar Bottle Insulated Water Bottle 24 oz - 100% BPA-Free Cycling and Sports Water Bottle - Dishwasher & Freezer Safe (Andromeda, 24 ounce)
product_meta.description: Color:Andromeda| Style:24 OzPolar bottle is the original insulated plastic Sport bottle and has been keeping liquids colder, longer, since 1994. The bottle has evolved in the years since with brightly colored foil liners and patterns and an innovative removable Valve system. Made in America, Polar bottle is popular throughout the world.
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL INSULATED WATER BOTTLE - As the first to make insulated, BPA-free plastic sports water bottles, Polar Bottle has had over 20 years to perfect keeping liquids stored and cool for twice as long.

ULTIMATE THERMAL PROTECTION - The double-wall construction of our insulated water bottles creates a thermal barrier of air to keep heat out and cold in. Foil layers reflect solar rays for additional thermal protection. Dishwasher and freezer safe.

SPORTS OR BIKE WATER BOTTLE - Our 20 oz. size, the first size we made and our top seller today, is the active way to hydrate. Take it everywhere you go, from a run to a drive to a bike ride. Wide mouth accommodates ice cubes and makes it easy to clean.

100% BPA-FREE WATER BOTTLE - Polar Bottle water bottles are and always have been 100% BPA-free and phthalate-free. Constructed of durable, lightweight and FDA food grade approved LDPE. Removable carrying strap offers extra convenience.

MADE IN THE USA- Polar Bottle Insulated Water Bottles are proudly made in the USA to reduce environmental impact and support local economies. Designed to last, each one of our water bottles comes with a lifetime guarantee.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
